message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to sell you this product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $900,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This is my final offer, as I'm confident I can find other buyers at this price point.
I understand your position, Alice. While I would like to purchase the product, I am unable to go above $1,000,000. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
